column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Maria - Thank you for your review. Can you tell me which ramen you ordered? We always encourage our guests to peruse our menu items carefully
column2: especially for those who might have allergies
column3: as our ingredients -- such as onions -- are listed. That said
column4: if you're ever dissatisfied with our food in any way
column5: we will do everything in our power to make things right
column6: either by remaking the item or offering an alternative. Did you ask for a remake after you received your dish(es)?
